description: This schema describes an ABR visualization asset (VisAsset), which is a digitized version of an artifact created in the real world.

artifactType.$comment: Some existing VisAssets may label this as `type`. Currently ABREngine supports both.

artifactData.description: Data that are attached to this VisAsset; the exact contents varies as to which artifactType.
artifactData.$comment: Some existing VisAssets may use a bare array here instead of an object. Currently ABREngine supports both.

preview.description: Filename of a preview image for this artifact

family.description: Broad description of artifact's material/construction to classify/categorize VisAsset. Example: Drawn

class.description: Specific description of strategy used by artist to create artifact to classify/categorize VisAsset. Example: Curved
